title: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: When using the Photon version, there is an issue where the popup menu does not appear when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in the Java editor. This popup menu should allow the user to add breakpoints or marks, but it does not show up as expected.
OB: 1) Open a Java editor. 2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler. 3) Observe that the popup menu does not appear.
EB: 1) Open a Java editor. 2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler. 3) Expect a popup menu to appear, providing options to add breakpoints or marks.
SR: 1) Open a Java editor. 2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler. 3) Verify that a popup menu appears, allowing you to add breakpoints or marks.
